forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. Northwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the day drifts into night, Downtown San Francisco reveals its tranquil beauty—a city illuminated by a thousand lights flickering against a backdrop of mostly clear skies. The breeze, gentle and mild, whispers promises of a cool night ahead, complementing the crisp December air. Anticipating a low near 49, one might reach for a layered sweater or a light jacket before venturing out. The city tranquilizes under a veil of twilight, with the faintest hint of fog, a remnant of the day, lingering along the edges of the bay but retreating from the heart of the city.

Saturday brings the warmth of the sun back into the fold, promising a high of around 61 degrees. As daybreak unfolds, the sun's rays will melt into the coolness, lighting up the Golden Gate and the rolling hills beyond. Strolling along the waterfront, one might embrace the moment with a warm beverage in hand, savoring the daylight as it spills over the horizon. The marine layer may dance just beyond view, a reminder of winter's tenderness, yet the day will beckon adventurers to experience the splendor of the city—perhaps a visit to a local café or exploring the art-laden streets. This is a rare kind of San Francisco day, one where serenity meets possibility, inviting each soul to step out and revel in the quiet joy of an urban December.
